    • generateRandomLevel

      public IGraph<String,BombWrapper> generateRandomLevel(int numVertices, double canvasHeight, double canvasWidth)
      Generates a random level graph with the specified number of vertices, canvas height, and canvas width.
      Parameters:
      numVertices - The number of vertices in the graph.
      canvasHeight - The height of the canvas.
      canvasWidth - The width of the canvas.
      Returns:
      The generated graph.

    • generateRandomBombs

      public void generateRandomBombs(List<Vertex<String,BombWrapper>> row, double percentage)
      Generates random bombs in a given row based on a specified percentage.
      Parameters:
      row - the list of vertices representing the row
      percentage - the percentage of bombs to generate

    • createVertexRow

      public List<Vertex<String,BombWrapper>> createVertexRow(double positionY, int amountVertex, double radius, double canvasWidth)
      Creates a row of vertices with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      positionY - the y-coordinate of the row
      amountVertex - the number of vertices in the row
      radius - the radius of each vertex
      canvasWidth - the width of the canvas
      Returns:
      a list of vertices representing the row

    • connectRow

      public void connectRow(List<Vertex<String,BombWrapper>> row)
      Connects the vertices in a row by creating edges between them in the graph. The edges are created based on the position of the vertices in the row. If a vertex is the first or last in the row, it is connected to its adjacent vertex. If a vertex is in the middle of the row, it is connected to both its adjacent vertices.
      Parameters:
      row - the list of vertices representing a row in the graph
